title: Vigenère's Legacy
description:
The following ciphertext was encrypted using a Vigenère cipher with the key 'CYBER':

hmef{xljiqzvi_ku_nqn_dtecsqj}

Decrypt it to find the flag.

Note: Only alphabetic characters are encrypted; symbols and numbers are unchanged.
hints: Vigenère uses a repeating key to shift each letter differently
To decrypt: subtract each key letter from the cipher letter (mod 26)
Key CYBER = shifts of [2,24,1,4,17] — apply in sequence, skipping non-alpha chars
